Barbarian.description:
A fearless warrior fueled by rage, capable of unleashing devastating melee attacks while shrugging off damage.

+10% Physical Damage, +5% Max HP, -5% Magic Resistance

Bard.description:
A charismatic performer who empowers allies with magical music, buffs, and debuffs while being highly adaptable in combat.

+10% Buff Duration, +5% Critical Chance, -5% Physical Defense

Cleric.description:
A divine caster who heals, protects, and smites enemies with holy magic, making them an essential support in any team.

+10% Healing Effectiveness, +5% Magic Resistance, -5% Attack Speed

Druid.description:
A guardian of nature, wielding elemental magic and the ability to shapeshift into powerful animal forms.

+10% Nature Magic Power, +5% HP Regen, -5% Stamina Recovery Speed

Monk.description:
A disciplined martial artist who relies on speed, agility, and precise strikes to defeat enemies without the need for heavy armor.

+10% Dodge Chance, +5% Unarmed Damage, -5% Physical Defense

Mage.description:
A master of the arcane, capable of unleashing powerful elemental spells but physically fragile.

+10% Magic Damage, +5% Mana Regeneration, -5% Physical Defense

Ranger.description:
A skilled hunter and marksman who excels at long-range combat, using bows, traps, and animal companions.

+10% Ranged Damage, +5% Movement Speed, -5% Melee Defense

Rogue.description:
A cunning and stealthy fighter who relies on speed, critical strikes, and deception to eliminate enemies before they can react.

+10% Critical Damage, +5% Attack Speed, -5% Max HP

Warrior.description:
A heavily-armored combatant who specializes in melee combat, able to withstand significant damage and control the battlefield.

+10% Physical Defense, +5% Stamina Recovery Speed, -5% Magic Resistance
